title.narrative: Improving Energy Efficiency and promoting Renewable Energy in the Agro-Food and other Small and Medium Enterprises(SMEs)

description.narrative: The project aims to develop a market environment for scaling up energy efficiencies and enhanced use of renewable energy technologies for fuel switching in the energy intensive manufacturing small and medium enterprises (SMEs) in Ukraine as a basis for promoting their competitiveness while ensuring an integrated. approach for lower carbon intensity and improvement in the local environment.
